Name: Half-Life: Source
About the game: Winner of over 50 Game of the Year awards, Half-Life set new standards for action games when it was released in 1998. Half-Life: Source is a digitally remastered version of the critically acclaimed and best selling PC game, enhanced via Source technology to include physics simulation, enhanced effects, and more.
Meta Title: Half-Life: Source: Jun 1, 2004, Valve and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Half-Life: Source? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2004), developer insights from Valve, and a complete game summary.
